definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The immobilized cells fermentation techniques to produce chayote dry wine were introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 酵母细胞制备佛手瓜干型酒的发酵工艺。

sentences.english: The produced wine had high fermenting alcohol content, good wine color and enjoyable taste.
sentences.chinese: 得到的佛手瓜酒的酒度较高，色泽好且风味佳。

sentences.english: The citron melon, which grows in southern Africa, is one popular candidate for the watermelon's ancient ancestor.
sentences.chinese: 佛手瓜生长在非洲南部，作为一种西瓜祖先的候选瓜。

definition: white flowered gourd or calabash (family Crescentia)
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
choy sum/Chinese flowering cabbage/stem of any Chinese cabbage
